vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσκαρτερ-έω,
Doric dialect ποτι- [Refs 2nd c.BC+]:— persist obstinately in, τῇ πολιορκίᾳ [NT+5th c.BC+]; καίπερ ἀχθόμενοι τῇ καθέδρᾳ π. [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 adhere firmly to a man, be faithful to him, τινι [NT+2nd c.BC+]; of servants, remain in one's service, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; of a κοσμητής, [Refs]
__2.b remain in attendance at a law-court, τῷ βήματι, τῷ κριτηρίῳ, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2.c devote oneself to an office or occupation, τῇ στρατηγίᾳ [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; τῇ ἑαυτῶν γεωργίᾳ [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__3 passive, ὁ προσκαρτερούμενος χρόνος time diligently employed, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__4 wait for a person, Φιλέᾳ [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to join, adhere attend to; to be ready; to give attention, be faithful; to spend much time together
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to join, adhere attend to; to be ready; to give attention, be faithful; to spend much time together
to persist in adherence to, a thing; to be intently engaged in, attend constantly to, Acts 1:14; 2:42; Rom. 13:6; to remain constantly in a place, Acts 2:46; to constantly attend upon, continue near to, be at hand, Mk. 3:9; Acts 8:13; 10:7
vocabInfos._es_Definition: perseverar, dedicarse a, continuar en ; mantener compañia cercana con (HCH.8:13) ; ser un asistente personal (HCH.10:7) ; asistir (HCH.2:46) ; estar listo (de un bote)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 貼近於,對某人忠誠,服侍
2) 在某件事持續不懈
2a) 忙於,專注於,投身於
2b) 緊握,持續,堅忍 (徒 2:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 贴近于,对某人忠诚,服侍
2) 在某件事持续不懈
2a) 忙于,专注于,投身于
2b) 紧握,持续,坚忍(徒2: 42)
